Name: Baltic Spring Punch
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
MUDDLE peach in base of shaker.
Add next 3 ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
TOP with soda and briefly stir.
Garnish with peach wedge on rim.
Review: Sweet and fruity with fizz. It's peachy!
History: Created in 2002 at Baltic in London, England.
